entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who had seen Rufus Scrimgeour in the Daily Prophet. He is also referred to as 'he's' and 'the man Harry had seen'.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as a person who was with Rufus Scrimgeour and was limping slightly. He is also referred to as 'his mane of greying hair'.
